name: Prevention of insolvencies
text:
§431:16-113    To aid in the detection and prevention of insurer insolvencies:



	(1)	The board of directors, upon majority vote, may make recommendations to the commissioner on matters generally related to improving or enhancing regulation for solvency; and
	(2)	At the conclusion of any domestic insurer insolvency in which the association was obligated to pay covered claims, the board of directors may prepare a report on the history and causes of the insolvency, based on the information available to the association, and submit the report to the commissioner. [L 1987, c 347, pt of §2; am L 2000, c 93, §12]
